lead_paragraph: Chris Paul scored 18 of his 27 points when Los Angeles took control in the third quarter, DeAndre Jordan had 23 points and 20 rebounds amid another round of boos in Dallas and the Clippers beat the Mavericks 109-90 Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Paul, Clippers Storm Past Mavs in 2nd Half of 109-90 Win
headline.main: Paul, Clippers Storm Past Mavs in 2nd Half of 109-90 Win
